DOC.brief_summary: This study design assess image characteristic Flortaucipir ( 18F-AV-1451 ) subject participate Biomarkers Cognitive Decline Among Normal Individuals ( BIOCARD ) study Johns Hopkins University .
DOC.criteria: Males female provide consent currently enrol BIOCARD study Ability tolerate PET scan procedure Ability provide inform consent study procedure Has condition ( ) could augment risk participant compromise ability tolerate experimental procedure interfere analysis study data determine investigator Has history risk factor Torsades de Pointes take medication know cause QT prolongation . Has ECG acquire prior initial 18FAV1451 scan clinically contradict subject 's participation study determine investigator . Bazett 's correct QT ( QTcB ) interval must assess exceed accept value ( 458 msec male , 474 msec female ) . Females childbearing potential surgically sterile , refrain sexual activity , use reliable contraceptive method . Has hypersensitivity 18FAV1451 . Has currently clinically significant infectious disease , endocrine/metabolic disease , pulmonary/renal/hepatic impairment , cancer could impact study participation scan result opinion investigator . Has nonstudy relate radiopharmaceutical imaging/treatment procedure within seven day prior 18FAV1451 image visit . Is unsuitable study type opinion investigator .
